item.title: Binary Search
item.description: I’ve been learning algorithms for a while and it’s part of my constant learning goal for the year and i have commited to atleast 100 posts on this page so this next one i have done on binary search. Ever searched through a massive phone book for a name starting with ‘K’? Yeah probably not if your still in your 20’s! Anyway youâ€™ll have to imagine it. Instead of starting at the beginning, you’d likely flip to the middle.
